name: David Ramirez
text: After a couple days playing this Warhammer ARPG, I'm now realizing, I would really love to play a Battletech ARPG. It would pretty much be like Mechwarrior, except instead of being an FPS, it would be a top-down/ isometric action game and you get to tinker with your loadouts, get new parts, and eventually, new mechs.
